Question: Dongguan Topsky Electronics Co., Ltd CES 2024 product highlight and specification
Summary:
Dongguan Topsky Electronics Co., Ltd

CES 2024 Product Highlight:

- High-light commercial display R&D team established in Taiwan
- Focus on optics and low-power electronics research
- Scientific research team with high knowledge literacy and strong innovation ability
- National high-tech enterprise integrating R&D, production, and sales
- Emphasis on design innovation, strict demonstration, fine technology, and manufacturing standards
- Specialized in high-quality products
- 75-inch Outdoor Ultra-High Brightness Digital Signage
- Features outdoor professional High-brightness LCD display, HDR function, self-developed air-cooled heat exchange system, and IP65 rating
- Application scenarios include bus shelters, airports, hotels, high streets, squares, roadside, parks, and tourist attractions
